snippet: Same-sex couples in New Jersey and their families would suffer serious harm if marriage equality were delayed during an appeals process.
abstract: Editorial praises New Jersey Superior Court Judge Mary Jacobson for declaring same-sex couples should be allowed to wed; calls on State Supreme Court to deny request by Gov Chris Christie for temporary stay to prevent same-sex marriages in state.
lead_paragraph: Same-sex couples in New Jersey and their families would suffer serious harm if marriage equality were delayed during an appeals process.

headline.main: No Reason to Wait on Marriage
headline.print_headline: No Reason to Wait on Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
